name: 'Star Trek' Klingons Quiz | 'Star Trek' - Species and Planets | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what production did a Klingon first appear with cranial ridges (bumpy heads)?
options: Star Trek III: The Search For Spock
questions.explanation:
Star Trek: The Motion Picture.

	Trekkies questioned why Klingons looked different. The real reason was that now they had the budget to make them look different. But then cross-over characters Kang, Kor, and Koloth appeared, who looked mostly Human in TOS, but ridged in DS9. Finally, in DS9 ep 'Trials and Tribble-ations', Worf acknowledged that Klingons looked different in the 23rd Century, but not why.

questions.text: Who is the only Klingon Starfleet Academy graduate to serve as an officer on a Federation starship?
questions.explanation:
Worf.

	Torres is an acting lieutenant on Voyager, but she dropped out of the Academy. Kurn was acting First Officer of the Enterprise during an officer exchange program, but he never attended the Academy. K'Eylar was a special emmisary, not an officer.

questions.text: Who were the sisters of Duras?
questions.correct: Lursa B'Etor & lursa betor & betor lursa & b'etor lursa
questions.explanation:
Lursa B'Etor & lursa betor & betor lursa & b'etor lursa.

	Played delightfully well by Barbara March (Lursa) and Gwynyth Walsh (B'Etor).

questions.text: At the end of DS9, who was the Chancellor of the Klingon High Council?
TNG ep 'First Born': who was the Klingon K'Mtar in reality?
questions.explanation:
Alexander.

	Alexander at age 50. He felt that he had to travel back in time and make his younger self more interested in Klingon traditions.

questions.text: Who was the main antagonist in 'Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country'?
questions.explanation:
General Chang.

	Played by Christopher Plummer.

questions.text: To which Klingon did Kirk say, 'I'll kill you later.'
questions.explanation:
Maltz.

	Kirk had asked him, 'Help us or die'. Maltz replied, 'I do not deserve to live,' since he had lost control of his ship to Kirk's crew. 'Fine, I'll kill you later,' Kirk promised. After escaping from the exploding Genesis planet, Kirk sent him to the brig. 'But you said you would kill me!' Maltz implored. Kirk responded, 'I lied.' (Maltz was played by John Larroquette.)

questions.text: Who of the following is full-blooded Klingon?
questions.explanation:
Kurn.

	Kurn is Worf's younger brother. K'Ehleyr is half-Klingon, half-Human. Her and Worf's son Alexander is three-quarters-Klingon, one-quarter-Human. B'Elanna Torres is half-Klingon, half-Human.

questions.text: 'Star Trek V: The Final Frontier': Who was the Klingon Ambassador to Nimbus III?
questions.explanation:
Korrd.

	Slightly tricky: Charles Cooper played both Korrd in TFF and K'mpec in two TNG episodes.
